body:
All that random ass story telling and a boring villain explanation of why they are so great and above humanity just for it to end with them going broken arrow and bomb the entire site to shit after the primary objective was already taken care of by an unknown target(unknown to them)….3/10

The sex prob 4/10 or 5.8
It seems the author didn't know how to finish this series, so that in the end gave us two random dickgirls! What a shame. Over 350 pages in story but no proper conclusion.
Really thats it ? the story was interesting i hope there is a sequel so many plotholes
